cards.title: 0. The Fool
cards.description: The Fool represents new beginnings, spontaneity, and the freedom of unrestrained potential. It encourages taking a leap of faith and trusting the journey ahead, even when the outcome is uncertain.
cards.phrase: Step into the unknown with courage; the universe will guide your steps.

cards.title: I. The Magician
cards.description: This card represents potential, manifestation, and the power to create one's reality. It symbolizes a connection between the spiritual and material realms, suggesting the ability to transform ideas into tangible results.
cards.phrase: You have all the tools you need for creating the stage and the life that you wish for.

cards.title: II. The High Priestess
cards.description: The High Priestess symbolizes intuition, hidden knowledge, and the mystery of the subconscious. She invites you to trust your inner wisdom and look beyond the surface.
cards.phrase: Listen to the silence; it holds the answers you seek.
keywords: intuition, mystery, inner voice, subconscious, sacred knowledge

cards.title: III. The Empress
cards.description: The Empress embodies nurturing, abundance, and creative fertility. She represents growth in all forms — emotional, physical, and spiritual.
cards.phrase: Allow yourself to receive and to create; you are the source of life’s abundance.

cards.title: IV. The Emperor
cards.description: The Emperor symbolizes authority, structure, and stability. He represents leadership, discipline, and the power of taking control over your life.
cards.phrase: Build solid foundations with wisdom and strength.

cards.title: V. The Hierophant
cards.description: The Hierophant represents tradition, spiritual teachings, and the guidance of mentors or established systems. He encourages seeking wisdom through learning and connection with shared beliefs.
cards.phrase: Honor the wisdom of those who walked before you.

cards.title: VI. The Lovers
cards.description: The Lovers symbolize meaningful connections, choices in relationships, and harmony between dualities. It often signals decisions that align with personal values.
cards.phrase: Choose with your heart, but align with your truth.

cards.title: VII. The Chariot
cards.description: The Chariot stands for determination, focus, and triumph over obstacles through willpower and control. It’s about harnessing conflicting forces and moving forward.
cards.phrase: Take the reins and steer your destiny.

cards.title: VIII. Strength
cards.description: Strength represents inner fortitude, compassion, and courage. It’s about mastering yourself through patience and grace rather than brute force.
cards.phrase: True strength is gentle and fearless.
keywords: courage, resilience, compassion, patience, inner power

cards.title: IX. The Hermit
cards.description: The Hermit symbolizes introspection, solitude, and seeking inner truth. It calls for withdrawal from external noise to find wisdom within.
cards.phrase: Illuminate your path through inner reflection.

cards.title: X. Wheel of Fortune
cards.description: The Wheel of Fortune signifies cycles, fate, and unexpected turns of destiny. It reminds you that change is constant and life is in perpetual motion.
cards.phrase: Embrace the ebb and flow; fortune spins ever onward.

cards.title: XI. Justice
cards.description: Justice represents fairness, truth, and accountability. It speaks of cause and effect, encouraging integrity and balance in decisions.
cards.phrase: Let go and allow new vision to emerge.

cards.title: XII. The Hanged Man
cards.description: The Hanged Man symbolizes surrender, a shift in perspective, and patience. It suggests pausing and seeing things from a different angle to find clarity.
cards.phrase: Let go and allow new vision to emerge.

cards.title: XIII. Death
cards.description: Death marks endings, transformation, and rebirth. It signifies profound change, letting go of the old to make space for the new.
cards.phrase: Release what no longer serves; transformation awaits.
keywords: transformation, endings, rebirth, letting go, renewal

cards.title: XIV. Temperance
cards.description: Temperance speaks of balance, harmony, and moderation. It encourages blending opposites and finding the middle path through patience and adaptability.
cards.phrase: Find your flow by blending and balancing.

cards.title: XV. The Devil
cards.description: The Devil represents bondage, temptation, and illusions of entrapment. It brings attention to destructive patterns and the need to reclaim personal power.
cards.phrase: Break free from what chains you.
keywords: temptation, addiction, control, materialism, shadow self

cards.title: XVI. The Tower
cards.description: The Tower signifies sudden upheaval, revelations, and the collapse of false structures. Though disruptive, it clears the way for truth and growth.
cards.phrase: Embrace the storm; it's clearing a path for you.

cards.title: XVII. The Star
cards.description: The Star represents hope, inspiration, and spiritual guidance. It brings a sense of renewal and faith in a positive future.
cards.phrase: Your light is a guide through the darkness.

cards.title: XVIII. The Moon
cards.description: The Moon symbolizes illusion, intuition, and the mysteries of the subconscious. It warns of deception but also invites deeper exploration of emotions.
cards.phrase: Trust your inner vision, even through shadows.

cards.title: XIX. The Sun
cards.description: The Sun radiates joy, success, and clarity. It signifies positive energy, vitality, and the illumination of truth.
cards.phrase: Shine brightly; your path is clear and abundant.

cards.title: XX. Judgement
cards.description: Judgement speaks of self-evaluation, rebirth, and awakening. It encourages reflection on past actions and embracing a new chapter with renewed purpose.
cards.phrase: Rise above your past; your calling awaits.

cards.title: XXI. The World
cards.description: The World represents completion, fulfillment, and unity. It signifies achieving a goal and the wholeness that comes with integration and balance.
cards.phrase: Celebrate your journey; you are whole.

cards.title: Ace of Wands
cards.description: A spark of inspiration, new creative beginnings, and passionate energy. It signifies the birth of ideas and opportunities.
cards.phrase: Ignite your passion; a new journey of creation begins.
keywords: inspiration, creation, energy, enthusiasm, new beginnings

cards.title: Two of Wands
cards.description: Planning, foresight, and taking control of future actions. It invites you to envision your path beyond current boundaries.
cards.phrase: The world is in your hands; dare to plan boldly.

cards.title: Three of Wands
cards.description: Expansion, progress, and seeing the results of initial efforts. It suggests patience and strategic growth.
cards.phrase: Your efforts are setting sail towards new horizons.

cards.title: Four of Wands
cards.description: Celebration, harmony, and a sense of community. Represents milestones, homecomings, or joyful gatherings.
cards.phrase: Celebrate the foundation you’ve built; joy multiplies when shared.

cards.title: Five of Wands
cards.description: Conflict, competition, and clashing ideas. It reflects the need for constructive debate and finding alignment.
cards.phrase: From friction, new solutions are born.

cards.title: Six of Wands
cards.description: Victory, public recognition, and success. A sign of achieving goals and receiving deserved accolades.
cards.phrase: Bask in the light of your accomplishments.

cards.title: Seven of Wands
cards.description: Defense, perseverance, and standing your ground. It calls for courage to uphold your position.
cards.phrase: Hold your ground; your position is worth defending.

cards.title: Eight of Wands
cards.description: Swift action, movement, and progress. Things are gaining momentum; stay focused.
cards.phrase: Ride the wave of acceleration; your goals are within reach.
keywords: speed, momentum, communication, travel, rapid progress

cards.title: Nine of Wands
cards.description: Resilience, boundaries, and persistence despite challenges. You’re near completion but must guard your energy.
cards.phrase: Protect your progress; perseverance pays off.

cards.title: Ten of Wands
cards.description: Burdens, responsibility, and feeling overworked. A reminder to delegate or release unnecessary loads.
cards.phrase: Release what weighs you down; not all burdens are yours to carry.

cards.title: Page of Wands
cards.description: Enthusiasm, curiosity, and a playful approach to new ventures. Represents a messenger of creativity.
cards.phrase: Explore with wonder; your journey is just beginning.

cards.title: Knight of Wands
cards.description: Adventure, impulsiveness, and energetic pursuits. Embodies bold action and fearless exploration.
cards.phrase: Charge forward with passion, but watch for recklessness.

cards.title: Queen of Wands
cards.description: Confidence, charisma, and creative leadership. Represents someone who leads with passion and inspires others.
cards.phrase: Shine unapologetically; your fire ignites others.

cards.title: King of Wands
cards.description: Visionary leadership, authority, and strategic boldness. Embodies long-term vision paired with decisive action.
cards.phrase: Lead with vision; your fire shapes futures.

cards.title: Ace of Cups
cards.description: Emotional beginnings, overflowing feelings, and spiritual connection. It symbolizes the opening of the heart and new emotional experiences.
cards.phrase: Let your heart overflow with love and new beginnings.
keywords: emotions, love, compassion, intuition, new relationships

cards.title: Two of Cups
cards.description: Partnership, mutual respect, and emotional balance. Represents deep connections, unity, and shared feelings.
cards.phrase: Two hearts meet in mutual understanding.

cards.title: Three of Cups
cards.description: Celebration, friendship, and joyful community. It’s a card of social gatherings and emotional support among friends.
cards.phrase: Celebrate with those who uplift your spirit.

cards.title: Four of Cups
cards.description: Contemplation, discontent, and emotional reevaluation. It suggests needing to reassess desires and opportunities.
cards.phrase: Look beyond apathy; hidden gifts await.

cards.title: Five of Cups
cards.description: Loss, regret, and focusing on the negative. However, it also calls for shifting perspective towards remaining opportunities.
cards.phrase: Mourn, but don’t miss the blessings that remain.

cards.title: Six of Cups
cards.description: Nostalgia, childhood memories, and kindness. Reflects on the past with warmth and encourages simple joys.
cards.phrase: Reconnect with innocent joy and kindness.

cards.title: Seven of Cups
cards.description: Choices, illusions, and wishful thinking. Warns of being overwhelmed by fantasies and indecision.
cards.phrase: Discern reality from illusion before choosing your path.

cards.title: Eight of Cups
cards.description: Walking away, emotional detachment, and seeking deeper meaning. It’s a journey of leaving behind unfulfilling situations.
cards.phrase: Let go and seek what truly fulfills you.
keywords: departure, quest, emotional growth, letting go, introspection

cards.title: Nine of Cups
cards.description: Contentment, satisfaction, and wishes fulfilled. It represents emotional well-being and enjoying life’s pleasures.
cards.phrase: Your heart’s desires are within reach.

cards.title: Ten of Cups
cards.description: Emotional harmony, family joy, and lasting happiness. It signifies emotional fulfillment and community well-being.
cards.phrase: Embrace the joy of shared love and harmony.

cards.title: Page of Cups
cards.description: Creative inspiration, emotional curiosity, and messages of love. Represents a youthful, open-hearted energy.
cards.phrase: Stay open to surprise gifts of the heart.

cards.title: Knight of Cups
cards.description: Romantic gestures, idealism, and pursuing dreams with heart. Embodies a quest for beauty and emotional depth.
cards.phrase: Follow your heart’s quest with grace and imagination.

cards.title: Queen of Cups
cards.description: Compassion, emotional depth, and intuitive understanding. Represents nurturing, empathy, and deep sensitivity.
cards.phrase: Embrace your heart’s wisdom with gentle strength.

cards.title: King of Cups
cards.description: Emotional balance, wisdom, and compassionate leadership. Embodies calmness amidst emotional currents.
cards.phrase: Lead with a heart that listens and understands.
keywords: balance, diplomacy, compassion, maturity, emotional control

cards.title: Ace of Swords
cards.description: Mental clarity, truth, and intellectual breakthroughs. Represents new ideas and decisive action.
cards.phrase: Cut through illusion; clarity is your sword.
keywords: clarity, truth, intellect, new ideas, breakthroughs

cards.title: Two of Swords
cards.description: Indecision, stalemate, and difficult choices. It calls for inner reflection and balancing logic with intuition.
cards.phrase: In stillness, the right path reveals itself.

cards.title: Three of Swords
cards.description: Heartbreak, emotional pain, and sorrow. A reminder that emotional wounds need acknowledgment for healing.
cards.phrase: Feel the pain, for it will teach you how to heal.
keywords: heartbreak, sorrow, grief, betrayal, emotional release

cards.title: Four of Swords
cards.description: Rest, recovery, and contemplation. It’s a pause to regain strength before the next challenge.
cards.phrase: Retreat into stillness to restore your inner peace.

cards.title: Five of Swords
cards.description: Conflict, defeat, and hollow victories. Highlights the cost of winning at any price and invites reflection.
cards.phrase: Choose your battles wisely; not all victories are worth the loss.

cards.title: Six of Swords
cards.description: Transition, moving forward, and mental release. Represents leaving difficulties behind towards a calmer future.
cards.phrase: Sail towards clarity, leaving the storm behind.
keywords: transition, journey, healing, progress, moving on

cards.title: Seven of Swords
cards.description: Deception, strategy, and acting discreetly. It can signify cunning plans or the need to avoid self-deception.
cards.phrase: Move smartly, but stay aligned with integrity.

cards.title: Eight of Swords
cards.description: Restriction, self-imposed limitations, and feeling trapped. Encourages recognizing that freedom starts within.
cards.phrase: The ties that bind are often illusions.

cards.title: Nine of Swords
cards.description: Anxiety, worry, and sleepless nights. It reflects mental overactivity and the need for compassionate self-talk.
cards.phrase: Release the fears that haunt your mind’s silence.
keywords: anxiety, worry, guilt, sleeplessness, inner turmoil

cards.title: Ten of Swords
cards.description: Painful endings, betrayal, and rock bottom. Although difficult, it marks the end of a cycle and a chance to rise anew.
cards.phrase: From complete surrender, rebirth begins.

cards.title: Page of Swords
cards.description: Curiosity, vigilance, and mental agility. Represents a thirst for knowledge and uncovering hidden truths.
cards.phrase: Question everything, and stay sharp.

cards.title: Knight of Swords
cards.description: Action, determination, and charging ahead. Embodies ambitious pursuit of goals, but warns against haste.
cards.phrase: Race towards your goal, but mind the winds of recklessness.

cards.title: Queen of Swords
cards.description: Honesty, perception, and clear judgment. Represents mental clarity paired with emotional maturity.
cards.phrase: Speak your truth with grace and discernment.

cards.title: King of Swords
cards.description: Authority, intellect, and strategic leadership. Embodies logic-driven decisions with fairness and precision.
cards.phrase: Lead with reason, and justice will follow.

cards.title: Ace of Pentacles
cards.description: New opportunities in wealth, career, or material stability. Represents the seed of prosperity and grounded beginnings.
cards.phrase: Plant the seed of abundance; nurture it with intent.
keywords: prosperity, opportunity, manifestation, stability, new beginnings

cards.title: Two of Pentacles
cards.description: Balance, adaptability, and juggling responsibilities. It reflects the need for flexibility in managing life’s demands.
cards.phrase: Stay fluid as you balance life's dance.
keywords: balance, adaptability, multitasking, time management, flexibility

cards.title: Three of Pentacles
cards.description: Collaboration, craftsmanship, and teamwork. Highlights the power of shared effort and recognition of skills.
cards.phrase: Build together; mastery grows through collaboration.

cards.title: Four of Pentacles
cards.description: Security, control, and holding onto resources. Warns against excessive possessiveness or fear of loss.
cards.phrase: Hold on, but know when to let go.

cards.title: Five of Pentacles
cards.description: Financial hardship, isolation, and insecurity. A reminder that support is available if you seek it.
cards.phrase: In times of need, look for the light of support.

cards.title: Six of Pentacles
cards.description: Generosity, sharing wealth, and balance of giving and receiving. Represents charity, fairness, and flow of abundance.
cards.phrase: Give with an open heart; receive with gratitude.

cards.title: Seven of Pentacles
cards.description: Patience, long-term investment, and assessing progress. Encourages reflection on efforts and future rewards.
cards.phrase: Pause and evaluate; growth takes time.

cards.title: Eight of Pentacles
cards.description: Skill development, hard work, and dedication. It signifies honing your craft through focused effort.
cards.phrase: Mastery is born from dedication and repetition.

cards.title: Nine of Pentacles
cards.description: Self-sufficiency, luxury, and enjoying the fruits of labor. Embodies independence and personal success.
cards.phrase: Revel in the abundance you've cultivated.

cards.title: Ten of Pentacles
cards.description: Legacy, family wealth, and long-term stability. Represents generational success and lasting achievements.
cards.phrase: Build a legacy that stands the test of time.
keywords: legacy, family, stability, inheritance, long-term success

cards.title: Page of Pentacles
cards.description: Ambition, new studies, and laying solid foundations. Represents a thirst for learning and material growth.
cards.phrase: Set your intentions; the path of learning begins.

cards.title: Knight of Pentacles
cards.description: Hard work, reliability, and steady progress. Embodies persistence and dedication to long-term goals.
cards.phrase: Move with purpose; consistency builds empires.
keywords: diligence, patience, responsibility, loyalty, hard work

cards.title: Queen of Pentacles
cards.description: Nurturing abundance, practicality, and resourcefulness. Represents creating comfort and stability for oneself and others.
cards.phrase: Cultivate abundance with care and grounded wisdom.

cards.title: King of Pentacles
cards.description: Wealth, leadership, and mastery over material realms. Embodies success, security, and generosity through wisdom.
cards.phrase: Lead with wisdom; prosperity follows those who stay grounded.
